text: Ralf Winkler, better known by his artistic name A. R. Penck (5 October 1939 â€“ 2 May 2017) was a German painter and sculptor. He was a leading artist in both East Germany and later West Germany in the period after World War II. He was one of the main painters of neo-expressionism. ==Related pages== *List of German painters Category:1939 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German painters Category:German sculptors
